segments.text: So people can go and root for their old school team ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yep . And relive those good old high school days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You don't sound too excited about going to your reunion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not . I get a stomachache just thinking about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you nervous about meeting up with your ex , Femi ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ouch , that hurts â€” did you have to mention her name ?
segments.speaker: S2
